original_text: He is to lay his hand on the goat’s head and slaughter it at the place where the burnt offering is slaughtered before the Lord. It is a sin offering.
korean_text: 그 숫염소의 머리에 안수하고 여호와 앞 번제물을 잡는 곳에서 잡을지니 이는 속죄제라

sentences.original_text: He is to lay his hand on the goat's head
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 염소의 머리 위에 손을 얹어야 한다

sentences.original_text: at the place where the burnt offering is slaughtered
